entries.title: New Instagram Updates Bring Massive Changes
entries.description: One of the biggest Instagram updates yet.

entries.title: Humanity Will Wipe Out More Than A Quarter Of Earth’s Biodiversity In The Next 100 Years
entries.description: Thanks to a virtual Earth complete with artificial species, scientists predict what species will likely disappear in the next century due to humanity's impact on the planet.

entries.title: Tracking Elon Musk’s Jet Is Legit For Another Reason
entries.description: Tesla owes its success to a quality product and Musk’s savvy, but these are not the only ingredients that have driven sales, the stock price and Musk’s wealth.

entries.title: A Tesla It’s Not — But 2023 Chevy Bolt Is A Practical EV At A Sane Price
entries.description: Chevy Bolt is a no-frills, reliable GM hatchback at a reasonable price.

entries.title: Why Do We Love Some Animals But Kill Or Eat Others?
entries.description: People have incredibly illogical and inconsistent biases about different animals in general, but at the same time, even vegetarians generally agree with non-vegetarians

entries.title: Forget The MacBook Pro, Apple Has Something Better
entries.description: Apple is set to offer consumers something they have long wanted from the MacBook... but you'll need to wait a bit longer.

entries.title: 2022 Holiday Gift Guide: Bluetooth Speakers
entries.description: Stuck for holiday gift ideas? If you’re shopping for a music lover, this list of tested and recommended Bluetooth speakers should help you out.

entries.title: Holidays Treats And Meals That Social Media Users Just Love
entries.description: The holiday season is here, that means it’s time to party. These meals, holiday treats, and foodie products have a strong following on social media.

entries.title: ‘Avatar: The Way Of Water’ Is Reviewing Worse Among Critics, Better Among Fans Than ‘Avatar 1’
entries.description: It’s a little hard to believe that after so many years of delays that Avatar 2 has finally arrived, though it has dropped the number and is just “Avatar: The Way of Water.”

entries.title: ‘Wednesday’ Dethroned In Netflix’s Top 10 List By The Same Show Twice
entries.description: Here's what new show has knocked Wednesday off the #1 spot in Netflix's top 10 list, again.

entries.title: Reimagining Alzheimer’s (Part 7): Cholesterol Abnormalities May Contribute To Alzheimer’s Disease
entries.description: This is the second story on how a novel aspect of the APOE4 genetic predisposition to Alzheimer’s was recently uncovered by a team at MIT and may lead to the potential for new diagnostic methods and treatments.

entries.title: The Best Builds For Speedrunning ‘Destiny 2’ Heist Battlegrounds
entries.description: Well, here’s an article I never thought I’d be writing, a strategy article about a Destiny 2 seasonal activity. But, Bungie has flipped a few switches and for Season of the Seraph, they’ve made Heist Battlegrounds quite a bit harder than your normal seasonal activity by putting a +5 power disparity

entries.title: Leak Unveils More Vintage Hi-Fi With Cutting-Edge Audio Technology
entries.description: After a four-decade absence from the market, the legendary British hi-fi brand LEAK has announced a new and more powerful integrated amplifier to its current range. The LEAK Stereo 230 will be available from January 2023.

entries.title: I Have Questions About The Coming James Gunn Era Of DC
entries.description: While whoever took the reins of DC was always going to have a tough time, the beginning of the James Gunn era, who is now running the place with Peter Safran, has seemed…especially turbulent.

entries.title: France Team Hit By Virus Outbreak Before 2022 World Cup Final Versus Argentina
entries.description: Will France be missing any key team members when they take the field on Sunday in Qatar? Here are the players who have been affected so far.

entries.title: Santa Claus Is Coming To Town And NORAD Will Be Tracking Him – Unless Elon Musk Decides Otherwise
entries.description: On Christmas Eve, children can follow along with the North American Aerospace Defense Command's "Santa Tracker," beginning at 4 am ET.

entries.title: John Carmack Quits Meta, Has Traditionally Harsh Words On The Way Out
entries.description: If you needed further indication that Meta’s pursuit of the metaverse is moving in the wrong direction, look no further than this latest development. Gaming industry legend John Carmack has quit his advisory role at Meta.

entries.title: Hands-On With 3 Roomba Alternatives To Gift This Holiday Season
entries.description: These robot mop/vac alternatives from Roborock, Ecovacs, and Narwal are even better than the ubiquitous brand.

entries.title: More Than One Million May Die In China From Covid Through 2023 – Report

entries.title: Marjorie Taylor Greene’s Mask Question Problematically Compares Covid-19 Coronavirus To Farts
entries.description: Here's why farts are different from Covid-19 and why you may still be able to smell a fart while wearing a face mask.

entries.description: This week’s Current Climate, which every Saturday brings you the latest news about the business of sustainability.

entries.title: Grass Could Be The Answer To More Environmental Flying
entries.description: Long-haul aviation will be hard to decarbonize. Alder Fuels reckons it can solve this problem using its carbon-negative technology.

entries.title: NASA’s Webb Space Telescope Pierces Star Forming ‘Cosmic Cliffs’
entries.description: NASA’S new Webb Space Telescope continues opening vistas onto heretofore hidden astrophysics. This time it’s a nearby star forming region where stars that will evolve to be not unlike our own are currently in the birthing process.
